content:
The Department of Philosophy at Purdue University in collaboration with Argonne National Laboratory is seeking a postdoc for next fall ('25) who could work on projects related to any of the following: automation in mathematics; automation in science; topics in the philosophy of mathematics (e.g., proof) or science; The appointment would be in the philosophy department, but the committee is not particular about disciplinary background as long as itâ€™s relevant to the work.

https://www.higheredjobs.com/faculty/details.cfm?JobCode=178918062
(the link above is broken if you click it, but this one works)
